AT.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
AT.description: Die Zwillingsschwestern Mio und Mayu Amakura haben sich in ein Dorf verirrt, das von der Landkarte verschwunden ist und in einen ewigen Dämmerzustand versetzt wurde. Die rastlosen Geister der Dorfbewohner treiben sich auf den Straßen herum. Sie haben es auf Zwillinge abgesehen, die sie als Opfergaben für eine geheimnisvolle Zeremonie benötigen... "Die Opfer, sie sind zurückgekehrt!" "Warum haben sie versucht, zu fliehen?" "Wir müssen die Zeremonie fortsetzen!" Die Zwillinge versuchen, aus dem Dorf zu flüchten. Mio tut ihr Bestes, um ihre Schwester in Sicherheit zu bringen, die seit einer Verletzung in ihrer Kindheit hinkt. Es stellt sich bald heraus, dass Mayu einen Draht zur spirituellen Welt hat. Der Geist eines Zwillings, der einst an der düsteren Zeremonie des Dorfes teilnahm, ergreift mehr und mehr von ihr Besitz. Als die Schwestern der Wahrheit um das Schattenritual näherkommen, verflechtet sich ihr Schicksal immer weiter mit dem der Dorfbewohner...

AU.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
AU.description: Twin sisters Mio and Mayu Amakura find themselves lost in a village that has vanished from the map, a village veiled in eternal twilight. The restless spirits of the villagers roam the streets, searching for twins to use as offerings in a mysterious ceremony... "The offerings, they have returned." "Why did they try to escape?" "We must continue the ceremony." The twins search for a way out of the village. Mio does her best to safely lead her sister, who still walks with a limp caused by a childhood injury. But it soon becomes clear that Mayu is sensitive to the spirit world, and is being steadily possessed by the spirit of a twin who once took part in the village's dark ceremony. As the sisters draw closer to the terrible truth that lies behind The Shadow Ritual, their paths will intertwine with those taken by other twins in the past...

BG.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
BG.description: Twin sisters Mio and Mayu Amakura find themselves lost in a village that has vanished from the map, a village veiled in eternal twilight. The restless spirits of the villagers roam the streets, searching for twins to use as offerings in a mysterious ceremony... "The offerings, they have returned." "Why did they try to escape?" "We must continue the ceremony." The twins search for a way out of the village. Mio does her best to safely lead her sister, who still walks with a limp caused by a childhood injury. But it soon becomes clear that Mayu is sensitive to the spirit world, and is being steadily possessed by the spirit of a twin who once took part in the village's dark ceremony. As the sisters draw closer to the terrible truth that lies behind The Shadow Ritual, their paths will intertwine with those taken by other twins in the past...

BE.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
BE.description: Les jumelles Mio et Mayu Amakura sont perdues dans un village qui a disparu de la carte, un village plongé dans la pénombre pour l'éternité. Les esprits agités des villageois hantent les rues à la recherche de jumelles qui serviront d'offrandes lors d'une mystérieuse cérémonie... "Les offrandes sont revenues." "Pourquoi n'ont-elles pas essayé de s'enfuir ?" "La cérémonie doit avoir lieu." Les jumelles cherchent un moyen de s'enfuir du village. Mio fait de son mieux pour guider sa sœur qui boite depuis qu'elle s'est blessée dans son enfance. Il s'avère rapidement que Mayu est sensible au monde des esprits et qu'elle est possédée par l'esprit d'une jumelle qui fut autrefois sacrifiée lors de la cérémonie obscure du village. Tandis que les deux sœurs lèvent peu à peu le voile sur le mystère qui entoure le rituel occulte, leur chemin va croiser celui des jumelles du passé...

CH.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition

ES.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
ES.description: Las gemelas Mio y Mayu Amakura se encuentran perdidas en una aldea que ya no figura en los mapas; una aldea que vive en una penumbra eterna... Los espíritus de sus habitantes vagan por las calles, inquietos, en busca de gemelas como ofrenda para una misteriosa ceremonia... "Las ofrendas han regresado" "¿Por qué intentaron escapar?" "Debemos continuar la ceremonia" Las gemelas buscan el modo de salir de la aldea. Mio hace lo que puede para poner a salvo a su hermana Mayu, que cojea desde un accidente que tuvo en la infancia. No tardan en darse cuenta de que Mayu tiene una sensibilidad especial que la hace muy vulnerable a la influencia del mundo de los espíritus; está siendo poseída por el espíritu de una persona que en su día tomó parte en la misteriosa ceremonia de la aldea. A medida que las hermanas se acercan a la terrible verdad que se esconde tras El Ritual de las Sombras, su camino se entrelaza con el que tomaron otras gemelas en el pasado...

IT.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
IT.description: Le sorelle gemelle Mio e Mayu Amakura si sono perse in un villaggio sparito dalle mappe, un villaggio velato da un'eterna penombra. Gli spiriti irrequieti degli abitanti del villaggio vagano per le strade in cerca delle gemelle per usarle come offerte durante una misteriosa cerimonia... "Le offerte sono tornate." "Perché hanno tentato di fuggire?" "Dobbiamo continuare la cerimonia." Le gemelle cercano una via di fuga dal villaggio. Mio fa del suo meglio per guidare in modo sicuro sua sorella, che zoppica ancora a causa di un incidente accaduto durante l'infanzia. Presto però diventa evidente che Mayu è sensibile al mondo degli spiriti, ed è sempre più posseduta dallo spirito di una gemella che un tempo partecipò all'oscura cerimonia del villaggio. Man mano che le sorelle si avvicinano alla terribile verità che si nasconde dietro La cerimonia ombra, la loro strada s'intreccerà con quella di altre gemelle del passato...

NL.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
NL.description: De tweelingzusjes Mio en Mayu Amakura zijn verdwaald in een dorp dat van de kaart is verdwenen. Een dorp dat in een eeuwige schemer gehuld gaat. De rusteloze geesten van de dorpsbewoners dolen door de straten, zoekend naar de tweeling die ze willen offeren in een mysterieuze ceremonie... 'De offerandes zijn teruggekeerd.' 'Waarom probeerden ze te ontsnappen?' 'We moeten verder met de ceremonie.' De tweeling probeert het dorp te ontvluchten. Mio doet haar uiterste best om haar zus te begeleiden, die mank loopt door een verwonding uit haar kinderjaren. Al snel wordt duidelijk dat Mayu openstaat voor de geestenwereld, en langzaam maar zeker raakt ze bezeten door de geest van een tweeling die ooit deelnam aan de duistere ceremonie van het dorp. Naarmate de tweeling het gruwelijke mysterie van het schaduwritueel ontrafelt, kruist hun pad met dat van tweelingen uit het verleden...

NZ.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
NZ.description: Twin sisters Mio and Mayu Amakura find themselves lost in a village that has vanished from the map, a village veiled in eternal twilight. As the sisters draw closer to the terrible truth that lies behind The Shadow Ritual, their paths will intertwine with those taken by other twins in the past...

PT.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
PT.description: As gémeas Mio e Mayu Amakura dão por si perdidas numa aldeia que desapareceu do mapa, uma aldeia envolta numa eterna penumbra. Os espíritos inquietos dos habitantes da aldeia vagueiam pelas ruas, procurando gémeas para usar como oferendas numa misteriosa cerimónia... "As oferendas regressaram." "Porque tentaram fugir?" "Temos de continuar com a cerimónia." As gémeas procuram uma forma de sair da aldeia. A Mio tenta conduzir a sua irmã, que ainda caminha com alguma deficiência devido a um ferimento sofrido em criança. Mas desde logo se torna evidente que a Mayu é sensível ao mundo dos espíritos e está a ser possuída pelo espírito de uma gémea que em tempos participou na cerimónia negra da aldeia. À medida que as irmãs se aproximam da terrível verdade por detrás do The Shadow Ritual, os seus caminhos interligam-se com os destinos passados de outras gémeas...

RU.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
RU.description: Сестры-близняшки, Mio (Мио) и Mayu Amakura (Майу Амакура), блуждают по деревне, которую невозможно найти ни на одной карте. По деревне, погруженной в вечный сумрак. Неприкаянные души жителей деревни бродят по улицам в поисках сестер, чтобы принести их в жертву во время мистического обряда... — Жертвы... они вернулись. — Зачем они пытались сбежать? — Мы должны продолжить обряд. Близняшки пытаются выбраться из деревни. Mio (Мио) делает все возможное, чтобы вывести из деревни сестру, хромающую из-за травмы, полученной в детстве. Однако вскоре обнаруживается, что Mayu (Майу) подвержена влиянию мира теней, и в нее постепенно вселяется дух близняшки, которая когда-то участвовала в мистическом обряде деревни. По мере того как сестры приближаются к разгадке ужасающей тайны Обряда призраков, их путь все теснее переплетается с жизнью сестер-близняшек из прошлого...

SE.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
SE.description: Twin sisters Mio and Mayu Amakura find themselves lost in a village that has vanished from the map, a village veiled in eternal twilight. SI.name: Project Zero™ 2: Wii Edition
SI.description: Twin sisters Mio and Mayu Amakura find themselves lost in a village that has vanished from the map, a village veiled in eternal twilight. The restless spirits of the villagers roam the streets, searching for twins to use as offerings in a mysterious ceremony... "The offerings, they have returned." "Why did they try to escape?" "We must continue the ceremony." The twins search for a way out of the village. Mio does her best to safely lead her sister, who still walks with a limp caused by a childhood injury. But it soon becomes clear that Mayu is sensitive to the spirit world, and is being steadily possessed by the spirit of a twin who once took part in the village's dark ceremony. As the sisters draw closer to the terrible truth that lies behind The Shadow Ritual, their paths will intertwine with those taken by other twins in the past...
